pkgmetadata.longdescription: |Build Status|lxml to dict============`Package on Pypi `__A simple conversion of an lxml.objectify element to a python dictionary.Usage-----.. code:: python >>> from lxml_to_dict import lxml_to_dict >>> >>> lxml_to_dict() >>> >>> root = objectify.Element("root") # >>> b = objectify.SubElement(root, "b") # >>> b = objectify.SubElement(root, "b") # >>> a = objectify.SubElement(root, "a") # >>> lxml_to_dict(root) # {'root': {'b': None, 'b1': None, 'a': None}}Test----You can run the tests using`tox `__.. code:: shell toxPublish-------To publish a new version of this package your Pypi user needs to beadded to the project. (Ask Connor to give you access).. code:: shell # Update version number in setup.py python setup.py sdist twine upload dist/*.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/CRiva/lxml_to_dict.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/CRiva/lxml_to_dict
